title: Morning Subway
description: He didnâ€™t deliberate long.  Her actions were deliberate.  With every bump and sway of the subway, she pressed against him. Then, she lost her balance. With a free arm he caught her, pulling her close.  Looking into his eyes, she winked, turned and teased him the entire way.  First in the "Camilla Awakens" series of Romance short stories.  "Morning Subway" Camilla awakens to a new love in her life. Stumbling, she is caught in the most refreshing way by Sean . Her morning routine is enlivened as this amazing, sexy man helps her recover from a slip.
author: Camilla Margiana
